title: 7: S4E07 – "Manifesting Mayhem" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you three terrifying tales from authors MinisterOfOwls and Ryan Brennaman, as well as one anonymous author, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about weird weather, unsettling letters, and not-so-imaginary friends… or is it… fiends? See full episode details, including the text of the featured stories, here: https://www.simplyscarypodcast.com/series/scary-stories-told-in-the-dark/s4e07
